tagline: Empowering Women to Return to Work with Confidence
description: Professional life coaching services for women transitioning back into the workforce after taking time off for family.

author.name: Andrea Gray
author.title: Certified Life Coach & Career Transition Specialist
author.bio: I specialize in helping mothers transition back into the workforce with confidence and clarity. With over 10 years of experience in career coaching and my own journey of returning to work after raising children, I understand the unique challenges women face during this transition.

seo.defaultTitle: Andrea Gray Life Coaching - Career Transition Specialist
seo.defaultDescription: Professional life coaching services for women transitioning back into the workforce. Get the confidence and clarity you need to successfully return to your career.
